# cleaning text
# reference: https://www.kaggle.com/parulpandey/getting-started-with-nlp-a-general-intro
def clean_text(text):
    """Make text lowercase, remove punctuations and remove words containing numbers."""
    text = text.lower()
    text = re.sub('\[.*?\]', '', text)
    text = re.sub('\n', '', text)
    text = re.sub('\w*\d\w*', '', text)
    return text
